scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:package-json
scripts.clean: node -e "fs.rmSync('./dist', { recursive: true, force: true }); fs.mkdirSync('./dist');"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test

1.0.0.description: Write TODOs in CSS that ensure you actually do them.
